influencer.name: Authenticity Score
influencer.description: Measures how organic and genuine the influencer's audience and content appear.
influencer.explanation_template: Authenticity is {value}/100 based on {reasoning}. Key indicators: {details}.

influencer.name: Engagement Quality Score
influencer.description: Evaluates the depth and relevance of audience interactions (e.g., comments vs. likes).
influencer.explanation_template: Engagement quality is {value}/100. Audience interactions are primarily {quality_level} with {detail}.

influencer.name: Audience-Brand Fit
influencer.description: The alignment percentage between the influencer's audience demographics/interests and the brand's target.
influencer.explanation_template: Audience fit is {value}%. Strong overlap in {top_interests} but lower alignment in {weak_areas}.

influencer.name: Platform Risk Score
influencer.description: Assessment of the influencer's standing and compliance with platform guidelines.
influencer.explanation_template: Platform risk is {value}. This is driven by {primary_reason}.

influencer.name: Fatigue Index
influencer.description: Indicates if the audience is oversaturated with sponsored content.
influencer.explanation_template: Fatigue index is {value}/100. Recent sponsored content frequency suggests {saturation_level} audience saturation.

campaign.name: Predicted Impressions
campaign.description: Estimated total views for the campaign posts.
campaign.explanation_template: Projected impressions: {value}. Based on recent average of {avg_views} and content type lift of {lift_factor}.

campaign.name: Predicted Engagements
campaign.description: Estimated total likes, comments, and shares.
campaign.explanation_template: Projected engagements: {value}. Assumes a {engagement_rate}% engagement rate on predicted impressions.

campaign.name: Predicted Conversions
campaign.description: Estimated number of desired actions (clicks, sales, signups).
campaign.explanation_template: Estimated conversions: {value}. Derived from category average CTR of {ctr}% and conversion rate of {cvr}%.

campaign.name: Predicted Revenue
campaign.description: Estimated total revenue generated from the campaign.
campaign.explanation_template: Projected revenue: ${value}. Calculated using {conversions} distinct conversions at ${aov} AOV.

campaign.name: Predicted CPA
campaign.explanation_template: Estimated CPA: ${value}. Based on total budget ${budget} divided by {conversions} predicted conversions.

campaign.name: ROI Confidence Range
campaign.description: The minimum and maximum expected Return on Investment.
campaign.explanation_template: ROI Range: {min}x to {max}x. We are {confidence_level}% confident returns will fall within this band.

risk.name: Brand Safety Score
risk.description: Metric ensuring content aligns with brand values and avoids harmful associations.
risk.explanation_template: Brand Safety: {value}/100. Content history shows {risk_level} correlation with unsafe topics.

risk.name: Controversy Probability
risk.description: Likelihood of the influencer being involved in a future scandal.
risk.explanation_template: Controversy probability is {value}%. Recent spike in volatile sentiment detected requires monitoring.

risk.name: Fake Follower Probability
risk.description: Estimate of the percentage of followers that are bot/fake accounts.
risk.explanation_template: Fake follower likelihood: {value}%. Detailed scan flagged {anomaly_count} suspicious follow patterns.
